name: Tataviam Canyon
description:
Introduction

Approach

This canyon is just upstream off Piru Creek from the exit of Ruby Canyon. It is run as an addition after descending Ruby. Otherwise it would be a short 2 - 3 hour canyon. The approach through Ruby and the exit, however, offer a wonderful 2-day adventure.

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

The first descent was made by Dave Red and Alden Anderson.
